TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlSkin extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示控件外观，控件外观是一种用于定义应用于 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件的样式属性的方式。

span.span: Represents a control skin, which is a means to define stylistic properties that are applied to an ASP.NET Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面和控件开发人员不会 直接使用、 或 类。Page and control developers do not use the , , or classes directly. ASP.NET 页框架在内部使用这些类将 ASP.NET 主题中定义的服务器端属性和级联样式表定义应用到特定类型的控件。These classes are used internally by the ASP.NET page framework to apply server-side properties and cascading style sheet definitions that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skin files to specific types of controls. 对象 在运行时和设计时表示控件的命名外观或默认外观。 objects represent a named skin or default skin of a control at run time and design time. ASP.NET 生成 和 对象用于将主题和控件外观文件中定义的样式元素应用于 ASP.NET 网页和控件。ASP.NET builds , and objects to apply the style elements defined in themes and control skin files to ASP.NET Web pages and controls. 有关主题和控件外观的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information about themes and control skins, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在声明性 ASP.NET 页中为控件指定控件外观。The following code example demonstrates how control skins are specified for controls in a declarative ASP.NET page. 该示例显示在同一页中找到了三个 ASP.NET 服务器控件，两个控件使用相同的命名外观，另一个使用不同的外观。The example shows three ASP.NET server controls found in the same page, two that use the same named skin and one that uses a different skin. [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlSkin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlSkin/CS/controlskincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlSkin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlSkin/VB/controlskinvb.aspx#1)]
